meaningMnemonic:
Those who <kanji>patrol</kanji> and <kanji>inspect</kanji> are <vocabulary>police officer</vocabulary>s or <vocabulary>patrol officer</vocabulary>s.

巡査 specifically refers to the lowest-ranking officers in the police force in Japan, whose duty is patrolling or doing things around 交番 (police boxes), or responding to emergency calls.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
